sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SPADIX, in botany, anciently ſignified the receptacle of the palms. It is now uſed to expreſs every flower-ſtalk that is protruded out of a ſpatha or ſheath.

The ſpadix of the palms is branched ; that of all other plants ſimple. This last caſe admits of ſome variety : in calla, dracontium, and pothos, the florets cover it on all ſides ; in arum, they are diſpoſed on the lower part only ; and in zoſtera on one ſide.
